com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.security

Class TLSArtifactsGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.security.TLSArtifactsGenerator

  • class TLSArtifactsGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the creation of secrets to be stored against a given namespace.
